page.title: 07LUNAN PARISH RELIGION.
page.content: There is one church in this area, the Church of Scotland situated in the village of Lunan. The last resident minister retired in 1952 after which the church was joined with that of Inverkeilor, where the present minister lives. In 1983 these two churches were linked with Friockheime and Kinnel Church since when only monthly services have been held at Lunan. These services are held at 10a.m., the last Sunday of each month.The attendances are fair, with a hard core of about ten regular worshippers. SUNDAY SCHOOL. There is no Sunday School at Lunan, the nearest is held in Inverkeilor.
